DOC.brief_summary: This trial evaluate effect Nifedipine GITS Amlodipine besylate blood pressure rhythm restoration arterial stiffness young middle-aged non-dipper hypertensive . Half participant receive Nifedipine GITS , half half take medicine morning night . While half participant take amlodipine besylate , also assign take medicine morning night . Ambulatory blood pressure monitor arterial stiffness examination perform pharmaceutical intervention .
DOC.brief_title: Nifedipine GITS Amlodipine Besylate Recovery Blood Pressure Rhythm Arterial Stiffness
DOC.detailed_description: Written inform consent obtain participant .
